Name: Hard Driver 2
About the game: HardDriver 2 is a Hardcore platformer-runner where the player controls a car and dodging obstacles, collecting coins that can be spent on improvements such as a high jump, a gun or a jet engine! Game features: - Increasing Complexity - Beautiful Visual style - Dynamic Music - Improvement Store
